sentences.english: KN-2 is running at circle line of Chi-Chi Town, Nan-Tou County.

sentences.english: Sadly, though, they never lived up to Chi-Chi's popularity.
sentences.chinese: 但是遗憾的是，他们并没有集集那么受欢迎。

sentences.english: They have no scientific name and live behind a single rock in a cave off Chichi-shima island.
sentences.chinese: 它们生活在集集岛外一个洞的单岩后面，没有学名。

sentences.english: It could be used for reference in research of Jiji earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 可供深入研究集集地震参考。
